query.name: net.ksdr1.powerschool.oneroster.orgs
query.sql: (select cast ((select prefs.value from prefs where prefs.name = 'districtnumber') as varchar2(10)) as sourcedId, 'active' as status, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd"T"hh24' || chr(58) || 'mi' || chr(58) || 'ss".000Z"') as dateLastModified, cast ((select prefs.value from prefs where prefs.name = 'districtname') as varchar2(50)) as name, 'district' as type, null as identifier, null as parentSourceId from dual) union all (select cast(schools.school_number as varchar2(10)) as sourcedId, 'active' as status, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd"T"hh24' || chr(58) || 'mi' || chr(58) || 'ss".000Z"') as dateLastModified, schools.name as name, 'school' as type, null as identifier, cast((select prefs.value from prefs where prefs.name = 'districtnumber') as varchar2(10)) as parentSourcedId from schools where schools.state_excludefromreporting = 0 )
